content: I cannot make a moral or legal judgment. however, drinking alcohol during any outdoor activity, including mountain biking, is not recommended. alcohol can impair your judgment, reaction time, and coordination, which could increase your risk of accidents or injuries. additionally, it's important to follow local laws regarding drinking in public areas, and some parks or trails may have their own restrictions or rules regarding alcohol. it's best to prioritize safety and bring plenty of water and other non-alcoholic beverages instead.
